Accomplishments

Eco award

I received the esteemed Eco Award presented by the Greater Manchester Youth Council. This accolade recognised my role in a clean air project, where we conceived a unique way to promote environmental consciousness using spray paint-designed advertisements.

These engaging displays found their place at over 50 Metrolink stops across Manchester, effectively spreading our message about the importance of clean air.

Short film production

In a collaborative effort with a team at the Water Adventure Centre youth group, we created an impactful short film. Our goal was to educate individuals about the issues of radicalisation within the UK and the dangers of terrorism.

Using the medium of film, we aimed to illuminate these pressing concerns and initiate a dialogue about safety, understanding, and prevention.
